  <description>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>b1a1e54b-06bc-4b86-9ee4-d138a0558639#1#10</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A tudományok és a művészetek a húszas-harmincas években</string>
            <string language="en">The sciences and art in the 20s-30s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Wissenschaften und die kunst im 20s-30s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les sciences et l'art dans le 20s-30s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As ciências e a arte no 20s-30s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze ed arte nel 20s-30s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι επιστήμες και η τέχνη στη δεκαετία του '20-δεκαετία
του '30</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las ciencias y el arte en el 20s-30s</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tudomány fejlődésének és a modern művészeteknek a bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">The introducing of the evolution of the science and the modern arts</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">avantgarde,  építészet,  festészet,  szobrászat,  találmány,  </string>
            <string language="en">avantgarde, architecture, painting, sculpture, invention</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Einführen der Entwicklung der Wissenschaft 
und der modernen künste</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La présentation de l'évolution de la science et 
des arts modernes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introduzir da evolução da ciência e das artes 
modernas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'introduzione dello sviluppo di scienza e di arti
moderne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εισαγωγή της εξέλιξης της επιστήμης και των 
μοντέρνων τεχνών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El introducir de la evolución de la ciencia y de
los artes modernos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">avantgarde, Architektur, Anstrich, Skulptur, Erfindung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">avantgarde, architecture, peinture, sculpture, 
invention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">avantgarde, arquitetura, pintura, sculpture, 
invenção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">avantgarde, architettura, pittura, scultura, invenzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρωτοπορία, αρχιτεκτονική, ζωγραφική, γλυπτό, εφεύρεση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">avantgarde, configuración, pintura, escultura, 
invención</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

    </metadata>
